title: Loïc Rémy
summary: Loïc Alex Teliére Hubert Rémy (born 2 January 1987) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Süper Lig club Çaykur Rizespor.[5] He was described by his former manager Didier Deschamps as "a young international who is fast and powerful with huge potential".[6]
